    • Method Detail

      • openFileRead

        public int openFileRead(java.lang.String fileName)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Method that opens the file in read mode and initializes the buffered reader.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of file to be opened.
        Returns:
        This method returns -1 if the file doesn't exist or 1 in case of success.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readConfig

        public int readConfig(java.lang.String fileName,
             Environment environment)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Method that reads the config file and initializes all the components. It starts by opening the config file and read it line by line. In the first iteration it initializes the environment, in the following iterations it adds the entities to the environment.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the config file.
        environment - Environment that will be configured.
        Returns:
        This method returns -1 if openFileRead returns -1 or 1 in case of success.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeToLog

        public void writeToLog(Agent agent,
              int iteration)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Method that writes to the log in each iteration the coordinates, the memory and the perception of the agent.
        Parameters:
        agent - Agent whose data we are writing.
        iteration - Number of iteration.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeStatsToLog

        public void writeStatsToLog(Agent agent)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Method that in the final iteration of an agent writes the final statistics, the total distance travelled and the number of learnt objects. We don't print the number of different learnt objects because our agents never re-learn any object.
        Parameters:
        agent -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readAndPrintFile

        public void readAndPrintFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                    javax.swing.JTextArea log)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Method that opens and reads all lines in a file while subsequently printing them in the screen.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file that is going to be read.
        log -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
